description: This is the main entry point and root widget definition for a Flutter mobile application named 'Black & Gold Dining'. It imports essential packages and sets up state management providers for menu data, cart, and orders, initializing the app with a custom theme and home shell.

classes.name: RestaurantApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that initializes multiple state providers and constructs the MaterialApp with the app's theme, title, and home screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the RestaurantApp widget.
